title: Very minor Bloodlord Vladimir sound bug
body:
I'm really delighted Riot listened to someone in the gameplay board and made Vlad laugh again when he casts E. Unlike what most people seem to say, Riot does keep a careful eye on the playerbase's demands and fulfills them whenever possible and reasonable.

That said I just want to make a minor note that Bloodlord Vlad laughs with the vanilla Vlad VO when casting E. It's really no big deal but just pointing it out.

Example in this video of a TF being silly around me:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ri_oEJHSxQ

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey VaynexVlad OTP - 

Thanks for the report! This may have occurred with the Vladimir update. We can see what's going on here. ^-^
